name: Parachute Puzzle Panic
description:
You play Arjantis the Ferret with a mission to get back what means the most to him; the picture frames of his dead family. Scale the Sci-Fi buildings as you try to regain your pieces of the puzzle.

Created by Evan Leider, Mathew Mallory and Mateusz Piekut

Sk8board  - music by audionautix.com
